name: pr
description: Public Relations and communications: key messages, press release outline, social post templates, media pitch. Use for comms strategy and drafting.

tools.name: key_messages
tools.description: Generate key messages / talking points for a topic and audience. Use when the user wants PR messaging, elevator pitch, or consistent talking points.

audience.description: Who you're talking to (press, customers, investors, internal)

differentiators.description: Optional: what makes this different or new

tools.name: press_release_outline
tools.description: Generate a press release outline (headline, subhead, sections). Use when the user wants a press release structure or draft outline.

quote_placeholder.description: Optional: who will be quoted (e.g. CEO, founder)

tools.name: social_post_templates
tools.description: Generate social post templates for a topic and platform. Use when the user wants tweets, LinkedIn posts, or social copy.

call_to_action.description: Optional: CTA (e.g. link, sign up, learn more)

tools.name: media_pitch_outline
tools.description: Generate a media pitch outline (subject line, hook, body). Use when the user wants to pitch a story to press or bloggers.

outlet_type.description: Type of outlet: tech press, trade, blog, podcast

story_angle.description: The story or angle you're pitching

hook.description: Optional: one-line hook or news peg

tools.name: comms_brief
tools.description: Generate a short comms brief: do's and don'ts, key messages, and suggested channels. Use when the user wants a quick comms playbook for a launch or announcement.

channels.description: Optional: preferred channels (press, social, email, blog)
